name: MTLTextureSwizzleChannels
desc: A pattern that modifies the data read or sampled from a texture by rearranging or duplicating the elements of a vector.

items.name: init(red: MTLTextureSwizzle, green: MTLTextureSwizzle, blue: MTLTextureSwizzle, alpha: MTLTextureSwizzle)
var red: MTLTextureSwizzle
items.desc: The data copied to the first output channel.

items.name: var green: MTLTextureSwizzle
items.desc: The data copied to the second output channel.

items.name: var blue: MTLTextureSwizzle
items.desc: The data copied to the third output channel.

items.name: var alpha: MTLTextureSwizzle
items.desc: The data copied to the fourth output channel.
